channel.title: Tip for everyone who has a server! [OPEN]
channel.description: heyy just letting you guys all know that when you make a download link make it a jar. or zip. file please.. alot of people dont have winrar and trust me you will get alot of more people on your server if you make a jar or zip file! just letting you know because i have heard alot of people complain about it

item.title: Tip for everyone who has a server! [OPEN]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Thank you for trying to help, but this section is for requesting help only.

@eyeownyew: If you plan on flaming him, don’t post at all. If you do it again in the future, you’ll just receive a mute.

Read full topic
